API_Description: Indicates whether the text in the span is formatted as subscript.
API_Description_Reason: The property name 'subscript' suggests it controls or indicates the subscript formatting of the text within the span.
Returns: A boolean value indicating if the text is subscript.
Returns_Reason: The parameter type is boolean, which implies the property returns a boolean value to indicate the presence or absence of subscript formatting.

type.description: A boolean value that sets or returns whether the text is formatted as subscript.
type.description_reason: The parameter 'type' being boolean suggests it is used to set or get the subscript state of the text.
type.type_reason: The parameter is explicitly defined as boolean, indicating it accepts or returns true or false values.
